members.member: A class for performing LZW decoding.
Write out the string just uncompressed.
Add a new string to the string table.
Add a new string to the string table.
Append newstring to the end of oldstring.

The logical order of bits within a byte.
1 = MSB-to-LSB 2 = LSB-to-MSB (flipped)
Uncompressed mode flag: 1 if uncompressed, 0 if not.
EOL padding flag: 1 if fill bits have been added before an EOL such that the EOL ends on a byte boundary, 0 otherwise.
Invokes the superclass method and then sets instance variables on the basis of the metadata set on this decompressor.

member.name: T:C1.Silverlight.ReportViewer.C1ReportViewer
member.summary: Displays PDF and HTML documents with navigation controls.

member.summary: Display pages using the current zoom value.

member.summary: Automatically update the zoom value to fit one complete page inside the viewport.

member.summary: Converter used to show the Zoom value as text.

member.name: M:C1.Silverlight.ReportViewer.ZoomConverter.Convert(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Modifies the source data before passing it to the target for display in the UI.
member.param: The double or ViewMode value being passed to the target.
The of data expected by the target dependency property.
An optional parameter to be used in the converter logic.
The culture of the conversion.
member.returns: The string value to be passed to the target dependency property.

member.name: M:C1.Silverlight.ReportViewer.ZoomConverter.ConvertBack(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Modifies the target data before passing it to the source object. This method is called only in bindings.
member.param: The target data being passed to the source.
The of data expected by the source object.
An optional parameter to be used in the converter logic.
The culture of the conversion.
member.returns: The value to be passed to the source object.
